title: ETHICS & PUBLIC POLICY with Jonathan Wolff
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What is the role of moral and political philosophy in policymaking? Should we try to apply ethical theories broadly or look at each case as they come up? I discuss this, and more, with Jonathan Wolff.

description: What is the role of moral and political philosophy in policymaking? Should we try to apply ethical theories broadly or look at each case as they come up? I discuss this, and more, with Jonathan Wolff.
